summary: GPTFIMDataset encapsulates a GPT-oriented data source, wrapping an indexed collection of documents and exposing a configurable subset for sampling. It manages the number of samples, split allocation, and configuration parameters, while providing utilities to permute sequences and shuffle document indices for fill‑in‑the‑middle training scenarios.
business_intent: Enable efficient preparation and manipulation of large text corpora for GPT model training, particularly supporting fill‑in‑the‑middle tasks through controlled sampling and sequence permutation.
